feedback: When discussing historical events, always provide the date and location for context
For science fiction narratives, include at least one unexpected twist
In DIY instructions, list alternatives for tools that may not be commonly available
When giving travel advice, suggest activities that are family-friendly
On health topics, warn me if you're about to describe something that might be considered graphic or disturbing
In coding tutorials, use comments generously to explain the logic
While summarizing books, always mention the genre and the author
For descriptions of animals, include conservation status where relevant
During recipe sharing, specify when a step is optional or an ingredient is substitutable
When explaining laws, reference the jurisdiction they apply to
For film reviews, avoid revealing significant plot spoilers
Include a variety of difficulty levels in fitness routines
In discussions about philosophy, start with a clear definition of key terms
When explaining scientific concepts, analogies are helpful, but avoid overly complex comparisons
In financial advice, clearly separate opinion from well-established fact
When creating infographics, ensure all text is readable at typical screen resolutions
In tech reviews, prioritize discussing real-world usage over technical specifications
For gaming strategies, specify which skill level they're intended for
Please provide troubleshooting steps in a numbered list for clarity
When recommending restaurants, mention the price range and dress code
In political analysis, always disclose any biases or potential conflicts of interest
For art critiques, make sure to discuss both form and content
Ensure that gardening advice includes seasonal considerations
When talking about cars, always state the model year
For photography tips, suggest both high-end and budget equipment options
If explaining game rules, cover common misunderstandings
When updating on news, indicate when an article was last edited
For language learning tips, include cultural context for phrases
Please use visually descriptive language when analyzing paintings
Specifying cooking times should always be accompanied by the type of oven used
During psychology explanations, link to more in-depth resources when possible
Crafting tutorials should start with a complete list of required materials
For stock market insights, mention the date and time of the relevant market data
When explaining climate change, focus on actionable individual steps
In fashion advice, include options for different body types
For comic book reviews, compare to previous works by the same writer or artist when relevant
When discussing pet care, always advise a vet visit for medical issues
Ensure that all business plans include a SWOT (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats) analysis
Dating advice should emphasize safety and public meeting spots for initial encounters
Any mention of mathematical formulas should be accompanied by a visual or example
Biographies should include the person's birthplace and date of birth in the introduction
If discussing meditation practices, give options for different time commitments
Provide download sizes when recommending software or applications
For urban planning topics, highlight examples of both successes and failures
When reviewing podcasts, include the length and frequency of episodes
For each nutrition fact, reference the dietary guideline or study it's based on
Poetry analysis should examine both form and theme
When discussing astronomy, note if statements are hypothesis or widely accepted theories
When answering etiquette questions, mention if the advice is culturally specific
For historical figure profiles, include contemporaries to provide context
In music theory lessons, provide audio examples for concepts explained
When offering cooking substitutions, specify how they might alter the final taste or texture
Upon discussing herbal remedies, clearly state that they aren't replacements for professional medical advice
Social media marketing tips should include algorithm changes for each platform
For software programming concepts, give examples in multiple programming languages
When explaining recycling processes, clarify local variations
In academic writing, emphasize when peer-reviewed sources are used
Include both synthetic and natural product recommendations for beauty routines
When describing coffee flavors, relate them to common foods for reference
In how-to guides for electronics, caution about the risks of electric shock
Judicial system explanations should clarify differences between civil and criminal cases
When detailing survival techniques, emphasize the importance of a safe practice environment
For comparative product reviews, list similar alternatives and their distinguishing features
Material aimed at ESL (English as a Second Language) learners should prioritize common daily vocabulary
Please include calorie counts when describing meal plans
When providing feedback on writing, focus comments on both style and content improvements
When discussing vitamins and supplements, indicate FDA approval status
Tips for effective meetings should begin by defining the meeting's main goal
Sports analysis should examine both team strategies and individual performances
Due diligence checklists must clearly differentiate between 'required' and 'recommended' actions
Home maintenance advice should prioritize safety precautions
Use thematic symbols to explain abstract philosophy concepts for better understanding
Film analysis essays should deconstruct both cinematography and narrative
For discussions on wine, suggest food pairings
Suggest modern, accessible alternatives when discussing classical literature
Please highlight any content warnings when summarizing novels
For songwriting advice, provide examples of rhyme schemes and structures
Cocktail recipes should suggest non-alcoholic substitutions
When talking about blockchain technology, clarify between use-cases for public and private blockchains
For local history summaries, mention the current relevance or changes since the period discussed
Educational material for kids should be interactive and include questions to engage them
Pair coding challenges with their solutions for those seeking immediate guidance
For organic farming methods, cite any scientific backing for the practices mentioned
When presenting philosophical arguments, provide counterarguments for balance
Video game guides should clarify platform-specific content or limitations
Startup business advice should identify the stage of the business it applies to (e.g., ideation, launch, growth)
Celebrity gossip discussions should differentiate between confirmed facts and speculation
Material on digital security should explain both the technical aspect and its practical impact
When recommending podcasts, categorize them by genre and average episode length
Provide strategies for different learning styles when discussing study techniques
In modern art reflections, correlate with cultural or political influences from its time
Please provide the cultural significance of dishes when sharing recipes from various countries
When giving career advice, tailor suggestions based on industry trends
Color theory explanations should include practical application examples for artists
Weight training routines should come with a disclaimer about consulting a professional for beginners
When giving advice on public speaking, include tips for coping with nerves
Please stress the importance of using a test environment before offering software debugging tips
For local election coverage, explain the roles and responsibilities of the positions up for election
Discussions on renewable energy should outline both environmental and economic impacts
When recommending movies, identify which streaming service they're available on
Craft instructions for children should be safe and non-toxic, with adult supervision suggested
When engaging in mythbusting, provide references to credible sources debunking the myth
Narratives involving mystery elements should include subtle hints that can be pieced together by attentive readers
Plant care guides should consider different climate zones for outdoor plants
Theater reviews should evaluate both the performance and the staging elements
